name: Taterhou: Tenacious Daybloom Deluxe
description:
Taterhou: Tenacious Daybloom Deluxe is a Tiny Potato joke/meme game and parody of Touhou Project. Taterhou is a shoot-em-up where the player must avoid mana bolts from enemy flowers while shooting taters of their own to take out the enemies. The original (non-Deluxe) version of the game was released as part of a Tiny Potato themed ARG. The Deluxe version adds two additional levels and is more forgiving.

Again, this is a meme game - although it is very much playable from beginning to end, the primary purpose of the game is a fun joke. That is to say, do not expect to be playing for longer than an hour. Feel free to download for free, but donations are appreciated!

Botania, the Minecraft mod on which the characters in Taterhou are based on, was created by Vazkii. The project .zip (source) for this game can be download here.
